EmailTemplate.name: BSP RR Not Scheduled
EmailTemplate.subject: Enter Subject
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope you found your business formation consultation informative and helpful. I am now working with the attorney to create your personalized Business Starter Roadmap with easy-to-follow recommendations to get your business entity up and running.
As a business owner, I know it can be difficult to maintain your busy schedule. However, this Roadmap Review is important to allow you to review the attorney recommendations to establish your business.
If you have any questions or would like to schedule your review, please call me directly at (855) 787-1951 x{!User.Extension}, Monday–Friday from 6 am – 6pm PT or simply reply to his message. If I’m unavailable, you can also email bizhelp@legalzoom.com to reach the next available member of my team.
Thank you for reaching out to the LegalZoom Business Starter Team. I look forward to speaking with you soon.
{!User.FirstName} Business Account Manager (855) 787-1951 x{!User.Extension} BizHelp@legalzoom.com
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy.
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
